item.title: 数据库UDF记录
item.description: 前言 记录一下各个数据库的UDF SQlite ➜ workspace git:(master) ✗ touch udf.db ➜ workspace git:(master) ✗ sqlite3 udf.db SQLite version 3.11.0 2016-02-15 17:29:24 Enter ".help" for usage hints. sqlite> select load_extension("/home/coding/workspace/tt/sql3_udf/sql3"); sqlite> select do_exec("whoami"); coding sqlite> select do_exec("pwd"); /home/coding/workspace 扩展文件 sql3.zip 来源: GitHub - hatRiot/sql3_udf: Simple sqlite system UDF (runtime extension) mysql dai
